ApproxsimClient.map
Class AreaCreationDrawer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ApproxsimClient.map.BasicMapDrawer
                      ApproxsimClient.map.AreaCreationDrawer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, MapDrawableAdapterListener
public class AreaCreationDrawer
extends BasicMapDrawer

This class is used for creating new area for military units, teams, agencies and activities. The created area can be polygonial or circular. The existing area can be moved to another location. If the area is circular its radius can be changed. If it is polygonial the vertices can be moved and the new ones can be inserted.

See Also:
Serialized Form

addPoint

public void addPoint(Point point)
Adds new point to the polygonial. This method is used while the polygonial is beeing created.

Parameters:
point - point to be added to the polygonial.

addLastLine

public void addLastLine()
Completes the polygonial by adding a line between the last and the first points in the list. If the polygonial cannot be created all the points and lines are removed from the creator.

insertPoint

public void insertPoint(Point point,
                        Line line)
Inserts new point into the polygonial. This method is used to insert a point into previously definied polygonial.

Parameters:
point - the point to be inserted.
line - the line which is divided by the inserted point into two new lines. This line is later replaced by the new lines.

clearAll

public void clearAll()
Clears all line and point adapters from mapDrawableAdapters list.

moveShape

public void moveShape(double lon,
                      double lat)
Moves the area in the chosen direction.

Parameters:

lat - latitude of the new center of the actual area's bounding box.

createPolygonialShape

public Polygon createPolygonialShape()
Creates the polygonial shape from the list of lines.

Returns:
the polygonial shape.

findMeetingPoint

public Point findMeetingPoint(Point p)
Finds the "twin" Point of the given Point. In the polygonial shape the point where two lines meet represents of two Point objects. This method finds the "other" Point object when one is given.

Parameters:
p - a point in the polygonial shape.
Returns:
the "twin" point.

updateElementWithShape

public boolean updateElementWithShape(ApproxsimObject sComp)
Updates the location of the ApproxsimObject.

Parameters:
sComp - the updated element.
Returns:
true if the element is updated with new shape.
